title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
OB: Currently, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, regardless of the selection or context.
EB: The "Build" action should only be enabled when it is applicable based on the current selection or context in the Java perspective.
SR:
Here are the steps to reproduce the issue in the Java perspective:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click on any item or area where the context-sensitive popup menu appears.
3. Verify that the "Build" action is always enabled, regardless of the selection or context.
